subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ira Newble is not worried about a backlash for having spoken out about Darfur in a manner that some might have interpreted as unhelpful to the N.B.A.’s global blueprint for success.
snippet: Ira Newble is not worried about a backlash for having spoken out about Darfur in a manner that some might have interpreted as unhelpful to the N.B.A.’s global blueprint for success.
